name: 葉明豐
objective: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
schedule:
week 1: Ch1 Introduction to Statostics and Data Analysis
week 2~4: Ch2 Probability
week 5: Quiz #1
week 5~8: Ch3 Random Variables and Probability
week 9: Midterm Exam
week 10~11: Ch4 Mathematical Expectation
week 12~14: Ch5 Some Discrete Probability Distribution
week 15: Quiz #2
week 15~17: Ch6 Some Continuous Probability Distribution
week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: Quiz 1: 25%; Midterm Exam: 25%; Quiz 2: 25%; Final Exam: 25%
materials: Ronald E. Walpole, Raymond H. Myers, Sharon L. Myers, and Keying Ye, “Probability & Statistics for Engineers & Scientists,” 8th Edition, 2007, Prentice Hall.
